Description:
Detects usage of system utilities to discover system network connections

Author: Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Network Connections Discovery - MacOs
Query: sourcetype="macos-*" (process_path="*/who" OR process_path="*/w" OR process_path="*/last" OR process_path="*/lsof" OR process_path="*/netstat")
